name: Rory McCann
info:
• 简体中文名: 罗伊·麦克凯恩
  • 别名: ロリー・マッキャン
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1969-04-24
  • 身高: 198cm
  • 出生地: Glasgow, Lanarkshire, Scotland
  • 姐妹: Sally-Gay McCann
  • imdb_id: nm0564920
detail: Rory McCann (born 24 April 1969) is a Scottish actor and musician, best known for portraying Sandor Clegane on the HBO series Game of Thrones.
